How can I view a transaction using the Verus JSON RPC interface?

To view a transaction using the Verus JSON RPC interface, you can send a JSON RPC request to the Verus server. Here's an example using the `curl` command:

```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "z_viewtransaction", "params": ["1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

In this example, you need to replace `myusername` with your actual username and `http://127.0.0.1:27486/` with the URL of your Verus server.

Examples: > verus z_viewtransaction "1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "z_viewtransaction", "params": ["1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
